original_title: Thom Yorke and Jonny Greenwood - Acoustic at Le Reservoir
overview: In 2003, Thom and Jonny took to Parisâ€™ Le Reservoir to perform some stripped down versions of songs from their then upcoming Hail to the Thief, in addition to songs from their back catalog.
title: Thom Yorke and Jonny Greenwood - Acoustic at Le Reservoir
